official_title: Implementing a Low Glycemic Diet in Children and Adolescents Undergoing Treatment for Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia
inclusion_criteria:
* Diagnosis of Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia (B-Cell, T-Cell, or Mixed Phenotype)
* Within 3 days of starting the induction phase of treatment for Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia
* Proficient in English or Spanish
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 5 Years
Must have maximum age of 21 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Diagnosis of relapsed Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia
* Not meeting all of the inclusion criteria
